Entities

Class Movie

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entities.Movie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Movie
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a movie that is listed in the Movie Listing of Moblima Cineplex.
    Since:
    2017-11-16
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> movieTypeRate
      Movie Types Rates will be stored in a HashMap with movie type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values.

    • Field Detail

      • movieTypeRate

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> movieTypeRate
        Movie Types Rates will be stored in a HashMap with movie type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values. HashMap is used to create unique and non-duplicate key-value entry. HashMap

    • Constructor Detail

      • Movie

        public Movie(java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String showingStatus,
             java.lang.String synopsis,
             java.lang.String director,
             java.lang.String cast)
        Create a new movie listing when given title, showingStatus, synopsis, director, cast. The ratingList, reviewList and movieTypeRate will be initialized with NULL value.
        Parameters:
        title - This Movie's title.
        showingStatus - This Movie's showing status.
        synopsis - This Movie's synopsis.
        director - This Movie's director.
        cast - This Movie's casts.

        public void updateReviewList(java.lang.String review)

        Parameters:

      • updateTypeRate

        public void updateTypeRate(java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.Double rate)
        Changes the movie type rates of different movie types (E.g. 3D, Blockbusters, etc). A HashMap is used, so that it creates a unique entry for each movie type rate.
        Parameters:
        type - Represents different movie type rate to set or update,
        rate - Represents the new rate to be updated.

      • updateOverallRating

        public void updateOverallRating(java.lang.Double overallRating)
        Adds an overall rating of this Movie.
        Parameters:
        overallRating - This Movie's overall rating which is the average of all overall rating. Only applicable when there are more than 2 ratings.
